meaningMnemonic: You have to put <radical>flowers</radical> in a <radical>bright</radical> place if you want them to <kanji>sprout</kanji>. If they're left in the shade they'll just rot.
readingMnemonic: You want to grow these <kanji>sprout</kanji>s in your <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう), not outside. So you need to find the windows in your house that are the brightest.
